com.skoev.timer
Class SoundPlayer

java.lang.Object
  com.skoev.timer.SoundPlayer

public class SoundPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

Class responsible for storing the sound settings and playing a sound. Used by TimerControl

Field Summary
private  int soundDuration
          Sound duration in milliseconds for the soundSampledAudio() method
private  int soundFrequency
          Sound frequency in Hz for the soundSampledAudio() method
private  boolean useBeeper
          Determines the kinds of sounds played by sound()
private  boolean useSampledAudio
          Determines the kinds of sounds played by sound()
private  boolean useToolkitBeep
          Determines the kinds of sounds played by sound()

 void sound()
          Plays zero or more of three sounds, depending on the values of useSampledAudio, useToolkitBeep, and useBeeper.
 void soundSampledAudio()
          Plays a sound using the javax.sound.sampled package; the sound duration and frequency are the values of soundDuration and soundFrequency
 void useDefaults()
          Reset the sound settings to their default values.

Constructor Detail

SoundPlayer

public SoundPlayer()
Method Detail

sound

public void sound()
Plays zero or more of three sounds, depending on the values of useSampledAudio, useToolkitBeep, and useBeeper. The first one calls the soundSampledAudio() method, the second one calls the java.awt.Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().beep() method, and the third one prints the the bell character ("") to standard output.

soundSampledAudio

public void soundSampledAudio()
Plays a sound using the javax.sound.sampled package; the sound duration and frequency are the values of soundDuration and soundFrequency

useDefaults

public final void useDefaults()
Reset the sound settings to their default values.
